QuestData.Title: The Twilight Egg
QuestData.Description: The egg is unlike any that you've seen before. Its translucent shell appears to bend the light around it.$B$BAccompanying it, you find a note describing the arrival of a fertile broodmother at the Ascendant's Rise.$B$BPerhaps you should show this to Aronus.
QuestData.LogDescription: Take the Pure Twilight Egg to Aronus at the Gates of Sothann in Hyjal.
QuestData.RewardText: You were right to come to me with this, $n. This represents a great threat to us if we do not act swiftly and boldly.
